component.notes: Version 2.1: Keypad Buttons added in Shades. Version 2.1: ShadeSet entity added. Address1 is the RelayBlind VID. Version 2.0.1: Shades: UP-Address1, DOWN-Address2, STOP-Address3 Version 1.40 changes the SwitchOn/SwitchOff workflows to NO longer control TASKs (as well as the Switch Entity). Please use "Task" or "Task Press, Hold And Release" Entites or RFButtonPress/Hold/Release workflows.

action_argument.name: HeatPointTemperature
action_argument.note: Upper Temperature Bound for Heat Operation [08 - 45 (C) ]

action_argument.name: CoolPointTemperature
action_argument.note: Lower Temperature Bound for Cooling Operation [08 - 45 (C) ]

action_argument.name: ShadeLevel
action_argument.note: Percentage to not be shaded. 0 means all the way down, 100 means all the way up

action_argument.name: LEDOnRedColorLevel
action_argument.note: Specify the Red Level (0 - 255) for the LED On State

action_argument.name: LEDOnBlueColorLevel
action_argument.note: Specify the Blue Level (0 - 255) for the LED On State

action_argument.name: LEDOnGreenColorLevel
action_argument.note: Specify the Green Level (0 - 255) for the LED On State

action_argument.name: LEDOffRedColorLevel
action_argument.note: Specify the Red Level (0 - 255) for the LED Off State

action_argument.name: LEDOffBlueColorLevel
action_argument.note: Specify the Blue Level (0 - 255) for the LED Off State

action_argument.name: LEDOffGreenColorLevel
action_argument.note: Specify the Green Level (0 - 255) for the LED Off State
